subject: ATWP
additional_information:
This course will satisfy the Academic Writing Requirement (AWR). 
Registration for this section is reserved for self-Identified Indigenous students in order to build a cohort of support. To register, please send an email to tfirc@uvic.ca. In this email, please include your student number, state your interest in registering for the course, and confirm your Indigenous self-identification (no documentation is required).
